`feetures` for feature flags

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropenscilabs/feetures")
```

```{r}
library("feetures")
```

## basic usage

initialize object

```{r}
(z <- Feetures$new(adapter = AdapterMemory$new()))
```

register a flag

```{r}
z$register("foo")
```

if/else conditional

```{r message=TRUE}
if (z$enabled("foo")) {
  message("foo for you :)")
} else {
  message("NO foo for you!")
}
```

enable the flag

```{r}
z$enable("foo")
```

now try again

```{r message=TRUE}
if (z$enabled("foo")) {
  message("foo for you :)")
} else {
  message("NO foo for you!")
}
```

## expiration

```{r}
feat <- Feature$new("bar", expiration = Sys.time() + 5)
(z <- Feetures$new(adapter = AdapterMemory$new()))
z$register(feat)
z$features()
z$enable(feat$name)
z$enabled(feat$name)
Sys.sleep(5)
z$enabled(feat$name)
```
